plot: Eijun Sawamura is a pitcher who joins an elite school with a brilliant catcher named Kazuya Miyuki. Together with the rest of the team, they strive for Japan's storied Koushien championships through hard work and determination.
opening_theme: "Go EXCEED!!" by [email protected] featuring Masayoshi Ōishi
"Perfect Hero" by [email protected] featuring Masayoshi Ōishi
"Hashire! Mirai" (疾走れ！ミライ; Run Ahead Toward the Future!) by GLAY
ending_theme: "CLOUD NINE" by Seidō High School Baseball Team
"PROMISED FIELD" by Ryota Ohsaka, Nobunaga Shimazaki, & Natsuki Hanae
"FINAL VICTORY" by Seidō High School Baseball Team
